thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 11 of 3538
thread.title: Meg

author: Meg
title: Meg
text: Thrift Books had a wider selection of the books I was looking for than many other used books sites. Their prices (after shipping) were competitive or better than other sites. I like that I can put books in a wish list to revisit later. I was also able to add books that were out of stock for order later. The website even tells you how many of a given out of stock book thrift books averages every month which is helpful in knowing how long I may need to wait if I want to order from them. Great website, great experience, I'm sure I'll order again!
